name: Wally The Seal HD
description:
Wally The Seal is a recreaction of an old game project. Explore the maze and collect three pieces of salmon while avoiding Wally.

Controls:

(Shift: Sprint) (G: Drop Glowstick) (Movement: WASD)

Please send any and all feedback to Guncatgames@gmail.com

you can follow this games development here: https://trello.com/b/7MdkGHyu/wally-the-seal-hd
